data.title: Public Emergency Portal
data.meta_description: Emergency Response ArcGIS Hub initiative.  This is the unified site for the public to use during an emergency and for emergency preparedness.  This site should always have the must up to date info for the public with the most time sensitive info on the site and links to other sites for detailed information.  The site is a mix of static information and dynamic information from agencies within the county and from outside authoritative sources such as the National Weather Service, State of CA, etc.
